Container.Name: crypto-exchanges-gateway
Container.Description:
Your gateway to the world of crypto ! This project cannot be considered in any way as trading advice.
Download config.yml wget -O /mnt/user/appdata/crypto-exchanges-gateway/config.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aloysius-pgast/crypto-exchanges-gateway/master/config/config.sample.json edit config.json and change 127.0.0.1 to 0.0.0.0. Add API keys for the supported platform.
